SELECT *
FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, M.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, D.*, F.IDX FILE_NAME FROM USV_NOTICE_BOARD D, (SELECT IDX FROM USV_ATTACHMENT GROUP BY IDX) F WHERE D.IDX = F.IDX(+) AND D.DEL_YN = 'N'
BODY_TEXT LIKE '%$SEARCH_VALUE$%'
TITLE_TEXT LIKE '%$SEARCH_VALUE$%'
ORDER BY D.IDX DESC ) M )
WHERE rnum <= #lastIndex# and rnum > #firstIndex#
